name: SleepSheep
0:
”Alexa, open Sleep Sheep!”
”Count sheep.”
”Count to 1,000 sheep quietly.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sleep sheep
des:
Having trouble sleeping? Not to worry, Shelby the Sleep Sheep is here to help using the tried-and-true method of counting her friends.

Get started by asking Shelby to count sheep. For more control, you can specify how many sheep (either 500, 1,000, 2,000, or 3,000), and whether you want her to whisper.

Enjoy, and happy sleeping!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
